Description :

Looking to access your Microsoft OfficeÃ‚Â® files at any time? All you need is your favorite iOS device and Documents To Go in order to be constantly connected!

The latest update to Documents To Go Premium also includes an improved SlideShow To Go full screen mode & better slide navigation alongside numerous bug fixes!

What can I do with "DocsToGo Premium"?:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ EDIT, CREATE & VIEW Word, Excel & PowerPoint files (Office 2007/2008/2010)

THE DATAVIZÃ‚Â® ADVANTAGE
Documents To Go, now in its 14th year, is developed by DataViz, Inc., a producer of quality software for Macs & PCs for over 29 years. DocsToGo is currently preloaded on millions of devices around the world.
